title: Alcatraz Island: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps            NPS  Alcatraz Island Map This is a general map of the island showing various structures. For your safety, please listen to the announcements at the dock, since various areas of the island are closed to the public depending on the season. Open the PDF of the Island map by clicking here.         Historic Maps and Blueprints of Alcatraz This PDF file is from Erwin N. Thompson's historic resource study, The Rock. It contains numerous maps of Alcatraz from various periods of its history. Note that some of the maps are truncated due to the limitations of our hardware to convert documents to PDF. Click here to download the file.
